questions.question_text: A task on the critical path will not be completed on time. The project manager is reviewing both the schedule and the risk register to create a corrective action plan. The project completion date and quality of the deliverable cannot change. Which of the following activities should the project manager perform NEXT?

discussion.content: The project manager is reviewing both the schedule and the risk register to create a corrective action plan. In other words it was a risk event. Now move on to the Project Plan and update it.

I believe the answer is B. You should always record incidents and after assessment, a change request will be considered. You can't simply revise a project plan whenever you want to, it has to go through change control.
A. makes sense after giving it thought. additional resources not necessarily funding may help the situation.
Revise the project plan to request additional funding/resources

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the MOST appropriate communication method for a highly confidential message to a Multilanguage global project team?

discussion.content: A. Encrypted email is the most appropriate communication method for a highly confidential message to a Multilanguage global project team. It allows the project manager to send the message to multiple recipients with various language backgrounds at the same time. In addition, encryption ensures that only the intended recipients have access to the message, adding an extra layer of security.

choices.C: Social media communication through a secure connection
